baruch_longitude <- -73.98333
baruch_latitude  <- +40.75028

leaflet() |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, zoom=17) |>
  addPopups(baruch_longitude, baruch_latitude, 
            "I am a Doctoral student visiting <b>Baruch College</b>!")
